oracle.kubernetes.operator.helpers

Class ServerConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.kubernetes.operator.helpers.ServerConfig
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClusteredServerConfig, NonClusteredServerConfig

    public class ServerConfig
extends Object
    ServerConfig describes the desired state of a server.

      • getRestartedLabel

        public String getRestartedLabel()
        Gets the label that indicates that a server has been restarted. If a running server's pod does not have this label, then the operator needs to restart the server and attach this label to it.
        Returns:
        restarted label

      • getNodePort

        public int getNodePort()
        Sets the NodePort for the server. The port on each node on which this managed server will be exposed. If specified, this value must be an unused port. By default, the server will not be exposed outside the Kubernetes cluster.
        Returns:
        node port

      • setNodePort

        public String getShutdownPolicy()

        Returns:

      • getGracefulShutdownTimeout

        public int getGracefulShutdownTimeout()
        Gets the number of seconds to wait before aborting inflight work and force shutting down the server. Only used when shutdownPolicy is GRACEFUL_SHUTDOWN.
        Returns:
        graceful shutdown timeout

      • setGracefulShutdownTimeout
